creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Seat(bench) cover of yellow satin embroidered with a fretwork diaper in pink, and spaced dragon-phoenix medallions in shades of blue, tan, yellow and green. Border of Greek key meander in green and pale pink edged with narrow band of couched gold thread. Boxed border of the diapered medallion design. Lining of gold-colored satin damask.
title: Seat Cover(bench)
